title: Eliphaz Urges Job to Repent
summary: Eliphaz continues, urging Job to seek God and repent. He insists that God disciplines those He loves and that Job will be restored if he returns to God.

faq.question: What is Eliphaz’s main advice to Job?
faq.answer: To appeal to God and not despise His discipline.

faq.question: What assumption does Eliphaz make?
faq.answer: That Job’s suffering is the result of personal sin.
